-Guido Ceronetti

Tea transcends being just a beverage‚Äîit’s a ritual, a tradition, and a bridge between nature and culture. With over 3,000 varieties, tea offers an incredible diversity of flavors, aromas, and benefits. Despite its vastness, every true tea originates from one remarkable plant: Camellia sinensis. The wide variety arises from how the leaves are processed, combined, or infused. This guide delves into the unique categories of true teas, mixed teas, and herbal tisanes, as well as the distinctions between Japanese and Chinese tea traditions.

item.title: Space uniformity
item.description: Understanding the curse of dimensionality requires more than just examining the representational aspect of data. A key insight lies in the concept of intrinsic dimensionality (ID)‚Äîthe number of degrees of freedom within a data manifold or subspace. This ID is often independent of the dimensionality of the space in which the data is embedded. As a result, ID serves as a foundation for dimensionality reduction, which improves similarity measures and enhances the scalability of machine learning and data mining methods.
